content.question: According to the instructions, what change has occurred in Japan?

choices.label: Manufacturers are required to recycle some electronic goods for free.
Computers can be ordered online and delivered by mail.
Products labeled with a special mark can be disposed of in the trash.
A special form is required for the purchase of certain items.

content.answer: Manufacturers are required to recycle some electronic goods for free.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Make connections among cultural and interdisciplinary information provided in texts.
